title: Silicon Valley Policy Forum to Stress Preserving US Lead in AI
snippet: The Hill and Valley Forum, a closely watched gathering of tech industry leaders and US policymakers, will focus its next summit in Washington on preserving the American lead in artificial intelligence and expanding advanced manufacturing, according to the organizers.

title: Economic Survey calls for age-based limits on social media access, urges curbs to tackle digital addiction
snippet: The Economic Survey stopped short of recommending a ban but called for age-based limits, stricter verification and platform-level safeguards for minors, as global momentum builds to curb underage social media use.

title: Realme P4 Power 5G launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra SoC: Price, specifications and more
snippet: Realme has launched the P4 Power 5G in India on Thursday, featuring a massive 10,001mAh battery, 6.8-inch 1.5K 4D Curve+ HyperGlow display with 144Hz refresh rate, dual rear cameras, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra chipset, and Android 16. Available from Feb 5 in three colours via Flipkart.

title: Redmi Note 15 Pro and Pro+ 5G launched in India: Price, specifications and more
snippet: Xiaomi has launched the Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G series in India oon Thursday with a 200MP camera, large batteries, fast charging, durable design, and advanced connectivity features. The smartphones will go on sale from February 4, 2026.

title: Redmi Note 15 Pro series India launch today: Expected price, specs and features
snippet: Redmi is set to launch the Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G and Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G in India today. The new smartphones could feature 6.83-inch AMOLED displays, 200-megapixel cameras, powerful chipsets and fast charging, with availability confirmed via Amazon India.

title: Realme P4 Power 5G India launch today: Expected price and how to watch the livestream
snippet: Realme is launching the P4 Power 5G in India today, featuring a huge 10,001mAh battery. It os expected to house a 144Hz 1.5K curved display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra chipset, Android 16-based Realme UI 7.0, 50MP Sony camera and fast charging support.

title: Intel Core i9 laptops are built to handle demanding work and heavy multitasking
snippet: Intel Core i9 laptops are built for creators, professionals and gamers who need extreme speed, smooth multitasking and reliable performance for demanding daily workloads.

title: Amazon in talks to invest billions in OpenAI, source says
snippet: Big Tech companies are racing to forge partnerships with OpenAI, betting that closer ‌ties with the artificial-intelligence startup would give them a competitive edge in the AI race.

title: Ex-Google engineer convicted of stealing AI secrets for Chinese companies
snippet: Linwei Ding, a 38-year-old Chinese ‌national, was ‌found guilty after an 11-day trial of seven counts of economic espionage and seven counts ‌of theft of trade secrets for stealing thousands of pages of confidential information.

title: Apple acquires Israeli audio AI startup Q.ai
snippet: Apple did not say how it will use Q.ai's technology but said the startup has worked on new applications of machine learning to help devices understand whispered speech and to enhance audio in challenging ​environments.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX in merger talks with xAI ahead of planned IPO, source says
snippet: Musk, the world's richest man, is the CEO of both the private space company SpaceX and the artificial intelligence company xAI, which controls his social ‌media platform X. He also runs ‌electric automaker Tesla, tunnel company The Boring Co. and neurotechnology company Neuralink.

title: Apple forecasts March quarter revenue ahead of Wall Street estimates amid strong iPhone demand
snippet: Apple on Thursday said it saw record-high earnings in the final three months of last year, with iPhone sales surging in greater China. title: The first human test of a rejuvenation method will begin “shortly”
